thread.title: Arizona governor candidate reveals sex scandals
thread.title_full: Arizona governor candidate reveals sex scandals

title: Arizona governor candidate reveals sex scandals
text: comments After announcing his campaign last week, Noah 'Noe' Dyer posted on his website, under a tab titled 'Scandal and Controversy' the explicit details of his sexual history In an attempt to stop scandals from hindering his campaign for Arizona governor - one candidate has taken transparency to extreme lengths. After announcing his campaign last week, Noah 'Noe' Dyer posted on his website, under a tab titled 'Scandal and Controversy' the explicit details of his sexual history. In addition to getting to the bare bones of his bedroom activity, the site also provides a detailed personal account of his finances, religious views, family history, and, unsurprisingly, his views on privacy. Beneath the heading of Sex , the website states outright: 'Noah has had both deep and casual sexual experiences with all kinds of women. He is an advocate of open relationships. 'Heâ€™s had group sex and sex with married women. He has sent and received intimate texts and pictures, and occasionally recorded video during sex.' In the interest of having a 'real conversation,' Dyer said he hoped his transparency would take away from the distraction that other politicians ensue by allowing the 'nitty-gritty' truths to come out throughout a campaign. In the interest of having a 'real conversation,' Dyer said he hoped his transparency would take away from the distraction that other politicians ensue by allowing the 'nitty-gritty' truths to come out throughout a campaign RELATED ARTICLES
